text_block_list.text:
It was a flawless victory. Dream Journey's overwhelming run was…… 
enough to break the spirits of the other girls.

text_block_list.name: Sketchy Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
There's no way……! 
That this, this――

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
That this small, weak-looking Uma Musume could win…… 
is unthinkable, perhaps?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
It's true that the two of you have developed 
your bodies well. And that's why up until now, 
you've been able to solve everything through force.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I understand that well……after all, 
I've carefully observed how you two behave.

text_block_list.name: Big Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
……! 
Huh, what do you……――

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Your speed is remarkable however……it's unfortunate. 
If you had noticed that the pace was gradually 
increasing……then maybe it would have been closer.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
It really is unfortunate. I was hoping you 
would be a good source of growth for Or, but……girls 
like you would be a waste of her precious energy.

text_block_list.name: Big Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Y-you're……just an honor student, right……!? 
But then……w-what's with you……!?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
It's important to get rid of annoying flies as soon as possible. 
――I'd prefer if……you never hung around my little sister again.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry for making you wait, Trainer-san. 
Shall we head back?

Dream Journey seemed the same as always. Well-mannered 
and calm……but I couldn't ignore my discomfort any longer.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Understand……is it? I was just showing you 
everything. There are times when things are 
hidden out of consideration……isn't that normal?
choice_data_list: Like hiding that we've met before……?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Oh, so you finally remembered that now? You didn't 
seem to remember, so I took that in to consideration.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Oh, so you were tricking me in to answering 
that? That's not like you……because you're honest, 
straightforward, and kind……you have value.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Speaking of that……we were in the middle of a conversation 
right? 『Why did you choose me as your trainer?』……was it?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
My memory is on the good side, I'd say. 
When I enrolled and first saw you……I knew exactly who you were.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Someone who would give up your spot to some unknown 
girl, honestly open up about themselves when talking 
to others……It left quite an impression.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
There was noone that could have been more desirable. 
As the kind of trainer I would want……

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Please don't belittle yourself like that. 
You're an amazing trainer.

It was a bit of a shock. She had chosen me 
because I'm easy to deal with……at the same 
time I understood why she chose me……as a rookie.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
…… 
Should I return this to you?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Our contract. I thought things might turn out like this…… 
so I held on to it without turning it in.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Please do with it as you will. Tear it up or whatever…… 
You were the one that wanted to form a contract…… 
so I'll leave the decision to you.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
We can just pretend it was a short dream. 
――Forget everything……and return to our own journeys.

I would have to make a decision. I still don't 
really understand Dream Journey. I could almost 
sense an unfathomable darkness……however――

It wasn't like she had fooled me. I had chosen to 
contract with her based on her ability and personality. 
I couldn't ignore that for selfish reasons.
choice_data_list: (And I already knew what her dream was――)

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
…………………… 
I want to see the "End of a journey".

――The dream she mentioned back then, I understood 
what she meant now. It was probably something 
related to that "anego" she mentioned before.

After winning an overseas races, that Uma Musume said she 
wanted to see the next "End" and went on a journey……

If Dream Journey had something to do with that Uma Musume…… 
maybe that "End of a journey" meant――to reach that girl.

But I had seen that dream――Dream Journey's journey. 
I couldn't get the sight of her fierce drive out 
of my mind……just like that perfume she wore.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
――Oh……well well. If it isn't Trainer-san? To think 
we'd meet again. Do you have some business with me?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
This is……a trainer contract. Hm? It only has 
your signature, huh……Did you rewrite it?
choice_data_list: I want to sign a new contract

text_block_list.text:
From the moment I signed the first contract, I was already 
prepared. I already had a proper reason to make a new 
contract……one I wouldn't back out of. On top of that――
choice_data_list: I want to see the end of your journey
I want to see the end of your journey

text_block_list.text:
Given enough time, I would eventually understand 
Dream Journey. If I could eventually grow to 
earn her trust, then we could stand as equals.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……I see. You've already resolved yourself……it seems. 
Is that so……

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Ah, well…… 
I believed in you.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
That you're not the type of person that can just 
break a contract. Even if there are some conditions 
you can't accept……you'd believe in and just bear it.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
If not now, then maybe someday……that's what 
you would think, right? That's the type of 
person you are. I know all of that already.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
But, if I had to say the main reason……it'd be anego I 
guess. As you've already guessed, I have some connection 
with anego……it's also influenced my running style.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
With my running, you saw her dream, right? Passion, adoration…… 
It was truly a beautiful origin. I like it too.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Oh, is that so? 
Please, let me know, I'll use it for reference.
choice_data_list: It was your dream that I saw
It was your dream that I saw

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……………… 
Well, well……Thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I understand, then let's form a contract. 
One that can't be broken.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
――That's what you yourself have been seeking. 
Trainer-san……

Dream Journey smiled. Did I make the wrong decision? But, maybe 
from the moment I met her……this ending was already decided.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
But don't worry. 
I'll be taking you on an unparalleled journey.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Once again, from now on――I look forward to your 
continued support, for years to come. ……Trainer-san.
